amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part E of House Report 117-381 to require the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) to develop best practices for establishing behavioral intervention teams in educational settings.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) to develop best practices for establishing behavioral intervention teams in educational settings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rodgers (WA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 320 - 103 (Roll no. 284).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A005) pursuant to the rule.
